title: Fresh tomato and courgette soup
ingredients: ['450g courgette, sliced', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 litre chicken stock', '1 large tomato, chopped', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste']
